price: Halkan irraa xiqqaa qofa kan rafan turan.
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
